Uses of Class
net.java.jddac.common.type.JddacId

Packages that use JddacId
net.java.jddac.common.type Provides the basic data structures used in various APIs within JDDAC. 
net.java.jddac.jmdi.comm Provides the communication transport functionality in Java Measurement Dataflow Interface (JMDI). 
net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock Provides various Function Blocks used in Java Measurement Dataflow Interface (JMDI). 
net.java.jddac.jmdi.service Provides the Service classes specified in the IEEE 1451.1 specifications and used in Java Measurement Dataflow Interface (JMDI).
